name: Deathmatch
description: A sharp crimson polearm that was once a gladiator's priceless treasure. Its awl has been stained by the blood of countless beasts and men.
effect: If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by {0} and DEF is increased by {1}. If there are less than 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by {2}.
